                        function copyToClipboard(text) {
                            var sampleTextarea = document.createElement("textarea");
                            document.body.appendChild(sampleTextarea);
                            sampleTextarea.value = text; //save main text in it
                            sampleTextarea.select(); //select textarea contenrs
                            document.execCommand("copy");
                            document.body.removeChild(sampleTextarea);
                        }
                        $(document).ready( function () {
                            //(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
                            
                            var pi_user_id = "", pi_user_code = "", accessToken = "";
                        
                            var myData ={};
                            
                            myData.pi_user_code = pi_user_code;
                            myData.pi_user_id = pi_user_id;
                            myData.accessToken = accessToken;
                            
                            var table = $('#transactions').DataTable( {
                                responsive: true,
                                //ajax: '/get-transactions-data',
                                ajax: {
                                    'type': 'POST',
                                    'url': '/get-transactions-data',
                                    'data': function ( d ) {
                                       return  $.extend(d, myData);
                                    }
                                },
                                processing: true,
                                serverSide: true,
                                serverMethod: 'post',
                                columns: [
                                    { data: 'memo', },
                                    { data: 'amount', },
                                    { data: 'txid', },
                                ],
                                ordering: false,
                            } );
                            const Pi = window.Pi;
                            
                            Pi.init({ version: "2.0", sandbox: $("#sandbox").val() });
                            
                            async function auth() {
                                try {
                                    // Identify the user with their username / unique network-wide ID, and  qget permission to request payments from them.
                                    const scopes = ['username', 'payments', 'wallet_address'];
                                    function onIncompletePaymentFound(payment) {
                                        
                                    }; // Read more about this in the SDK reference

                                    Pi.authenticate(scopes, onIncompletePaymentFound).then(function(auth) {
                                        pi_user_id = auth.user.uid;
                                        pi_user_code = auth.user.username;
                                        accessToken = auth.accessToken;
                                        
                                        $('#username').html(" " + auth.user.username);
                                        
                                        myData.pi_user_code = pi_user_code;
                                        myData.pi_user_id = pi_user_id;
                                        myData.accessToken = accessToken;
                                        table.ajax.reload();
                                    }).catch(function(error) {
                                        console.error(error);
                                    });
                                } catch (err) {
                                    console.error(err);
                                }
                            }
                        
                            auth();
                            
                            $( "#clear_cache" ).click(function() {
                                var result = confirm("Are you sure you want to Clear Cache?, it will reloads the page.");
                                if(result)
                                {
                                    try {
                                        Cache.delete();
                                    } catch (err) {
                                        console.error(err);
                                    }
                                    try {
                                        window.location.reload(true);
                                    } catch (err) {
                                        console.error(err);
                                    }
                                }
                            });
                            
                            $( "#back" ).click(function() {
                                var result = confirm("Are you sure you want to go back?.");
                                if(result)
                                {
                                    //history.back();
                                    location.href="/";
                                }
                            });
                        } );
